PS2 Games Making Monsters In MR2
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Shrine Topics: CDs & Slating: PS2 Games Making Monsters In MR2
By Lisa Shock on Monday, May 14, 2001 - 06:18 pm:

When Sony first rushed games out for the PS2, most of them were pressed in DVD format (silver bottom disk). And, they don't make monsters in MR2, they simply give the same message as DVD films, "please insert disc". Now we are seeing discs in the truse PS2 format, blue bottom, and they do work.

Blue Bottom = PS2 Format/makes monsters
Silver Bottom = DVD/does not make monsters
